grid
Interface IGrid

All Known Implementing Classes:
Grid
public interface IGrid

A grid that consists of abstract squares.

Method Summary

Method Detail

canMoveFromCoordInDirection

boolean canMoveFromCoordInDirection(Coordinate fromCoordinate,
                                    Direction direction)
Returns whether or not one is allowed to move one Square from a specified Coordinate in a specified Direction. One can only move to coordinates that exists on the grid (i.e. fromCoordinate.getCoordinateInDirection(direction) must exist on the grid). One cannot move through walls or light trails. No two players can be on the same Square.

Parameters:
fromCoordinate - The coordinate one wants to leave.
direction - The direction one wants to move in.
Returns:
whether one is allowed to move one Square from a specified Coordinate in a specified Direction.

getItemList

java.util.List<IItem> getItemList(@NotNull
                                  Coordinate coordinate)
returns the list of items on a square, when there are no items on the specified coordinate an empty list will be returned.

Parameters:
coordinate - the coordinate of the square where the items are located
Returns:
a list of items on a square

getSquareAt

ASquare getSquareAt(@NotNull
                    Coordinate coordinate)
Return the square of the grid that has a specific coordinate. This method returns null if the location doesn't exists on the grid.

Parameters:
coordinate - The coordinate of the square.
Returns:
The square at that coordinate or null if the location doesn't exists.

getAllGridCoordinates

java.util.Set<Coordinate> getAllGridCoordinates()
Return all the possible coordinates in the grid.

Returns:
all coordinates in the grid
